question: Nowadays, a growing number of people with health problems are trying alternative medicines and treatments instead of visiting their usual doctor.Do you think this is a positive or a negative development?
text: Since ancient times public tried to treat themselves with herbals and other natural products. In
these days this type of cure is named as alternative medicine. Nowadays, more and more
a society with some diseases decides to use different medicines instead of classic medicine. In this
essay I will try to discuss the pros and cons.
In my opinion, the disadvantages outweigh the advantages of using traditional medicine. The first
reason is that nobody knows how this treatment will affect  a person’s health. There are a lot of
cases when using different herbals caused an allergic reactions and some people dead. The next reason
is that community who do not have any medical education try different medicines. They do not know
what the result will be and hope that it will be positive but not always is like that.
Although there are a lot of disadvantages, advantages might make people not go to their usual doctor.
The first and the main pro is that using herbals does not cause environmental problems such as air
pollution or gas waste. Many pharmaceutical plants use chemicals which have a harmful effect on the
environment. The other reason is that alternative medicines are usually much cheaper than usual
treatment as you do not have to go to a pharmacy and buy expensive drugs.
To sum it up, the alternative medication will be forever because it has some advantages that many
population think that they can outweigh the disadvantages but I do not think so. The conventional
drug which develops rocketry will drive out other types of medication in the future.

error_list.error_des: It seems that preposition use may be incorrect here.
The noun phrase reason seems to be missing a determiner before it. Consider adding an article.
The indefinite article an may not be required with the plural noun reactions in this sentence. Consider removing the article, or changing the noun to singular.
The noun phrase drug seems to be missing a determiner before it. Consider adding an article.
It seems that the verb develops does not agree with the subject. Consider changing the verb form.
